ğŸƒâ€â™€ï¸ Don't try to outrun the blaze. Instead, look for a body of water such as a pond or river to crouch in.
ğŸŒŠ If there is no water nearby, find a depressed, cleared area with little vegetation, lie low to the ground, and cover your body with wet clothing, a blanket, or soil. Stay low and covered until the fire passes.
ğŸš­ Protect your lungs by breathing air closest to the ground, through a moist cloth, if possible, to avoid inhaling smoke.
